item.title: Another meat eater, now drops burnt meat :)
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Good job but:

movemousesmoothEx(x,y,30,30,30,17,30); clickmouse(x,y,true);

Are a very burning type of code for a good scripters eyes. In other words they are higly detectable. Well at least ClickMouse(x,y,true) is not sure about MoveMouseSmoothEx.

Try using something like Mouse(x,y,randomx,randomy,true) and MMouse(x,y,).
Both are SRL commands but they are very undetecable as they move in a sort of spline.

Read full topic
item.source: Another meat eater, now drops burnt meat :)

item.title: Another meat eater, now drops burnt meat :)
item.dc:creator: @wall_of_fir wall of fir
item.description:
@wall_of_fir wrote:

[code]{=====WOF’s Cow Meat Eater/Burnt Meat Dropper.=====]
[ ]
[=====================================================]
[Instructions: ]
[ Have a different type of cooked meat in last, 2nd ]
[ last and 3rd last for auto color. ]
[ Declare how many different types of meat you are ]
[ eating on line 18. ]
[ Drag crosshair onto runescape. ]
[ Press green arrow. ]
[=====================================================]
[Thanks to Moparisthebest for teaching me scripting. ]
[Made for cow meat but could work on others. ]
[=====================================================}
program WOF MeatEater;
var x,y,cookedmeat,cookedmeat2,cookedmeat3:integer;
const
i = 1; //number of meat types

procedure GetMeatColor;
begin
cookedmeat :=getcolor(713,445);
cookedmeat2:=getcolor(668,445);
cookedmeat3:=getcolor(625,445);
end;

procedure EatMeat;
begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat, 534, 171, 759, 497)) then
movemousesmoothEx(x,y,30,30,30,17,30);
sleep(50);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(1900);
until(not(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat, 534, 171, 759, 497)))
end;

procedure EatMeat2;
begin
if(i=2) then
begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat2, 534, 171, 759, 497)) then
movemousesmoothEx(x,y,30,30,30,17,30);
sleep(50);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(1900);
until(not(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat2, 534, 171, 759, 497)))
end else
if(not(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat2, 534, 171, 759, 497))) then
begin
terminatescript;
end;
end;

procedure EatMeat3;
begin
if(i=3) then
begin
repeat
if(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat3, 534, 171, 759, 497)) then
movemousesmoothEx(x,y,30,30,30,17,30);
sleep(50);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
sleep(1900);
until(not(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat3, 534, 171, 759, 497)))
end else
if(not(FindColor(x,y,cookedmeat3, 534, 171, 759, 497))) then
begin
terminatescript;
end;
end;

begin
activateclient;
GetMeatColor;
EatMeat;
EatMeat2;
EatMeat3;
end.[/code]

Hope ye like it!

Read full topic
